section: The Term of this Agreement shall be for a period of [* ****] years and [*****] months commencing the 1st day of September 2004 and terminating the [*****] day of [*****].
explanation: The Term of the Contract is redacted. Therefore, it is impossible to know how long the contract is for, which means that it is impossible to know when the contract ends. This would cause issues with the contract such as the obligation to pay.

section: CONSULTANT shall exclusively play/use the MANDATORY PRODUCT. (It is expressly understood by the parties that CONSULTANT may play [* ****] clubs in the bag other than ADAMS GOLF clubs including, but not limited to, a putter by a manufacturer other than ADAMS GOLF but may not endorse those clubs and/or putter.)
explanation: This is a contradiction, because the contract states that CONSULTANT shall exclusively play/use the MANDATORY PRODUCT. The very next sentence says that CONSULTANT may play with other clubs not made by ADAMS GOLF.

section: During the term of this Agreement, from September 1, 2004 through [*****] ADAMS GOLF shall pay CONSULTANT a base compensation of [*****] dollars. The base compensation shall be paid [*****].
explanation: The final date of payment and the amount of the base compensation and when that base compensation is paid is redacted, making it impossible to know when the contract ends and how much CONSULTANT will get paid. This would cause issues with the contract such as the obligation to pay.
